name: Comedy Movie Quotes Quiz | Which Movie | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
American Pie  2.

	After Stifler had an Asian guy pee on him by accident, he went into the house, almost in shock and said this to his buddies sitting at the table playing cards.

Rat Race.

	Rowan Atkinson kept running around in a hotel lobby saying that, just before he fell asleep while standing.

questions.text: 'I got hit by a bus, I got shot, now you want to take my soul? What are you, the Blair Witch?'
questions.explanation:
Down to Earth.

	Chris Rock was saying this to Chazz Palminteri after becoming a rich white man.

questions.text: 'Come here Mr. Penguin, oh you're a quick one.'
questions.explanation:
Billy Madison.

	Adam Sandler said this after hallucinating a giant penguin, and then chased it around in a golf cart.

questions.text: 'Holy Schniekies!', 'Son of a...', 'Did you eat paint chips as a kid?'
questions.explanation:
Tommy Boy.

	He said 'Holy Schniekies' after he tried tipping a cow and ended face first in mud. He said 'Son of a...' after  he got hit in the head with the sail on his sailboat. Rob Lowe said this to Chris, after he sprayed him with water and he started dancing around.

questions.text: 'Come on Mitch, unleash the fury, UNLEASH THE FURY!'
questions.explanation:
Road Trip.

	Tom Green was talking to a snake that was about to eat a mouse.

questions.text: 'I thought we were going to be together forever, and then out of the blue she sends me a John Deer letter.'
questions.explanation:
Dumb & Dumber.

	Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels were talking in a hot tub about previous relationships.

questions.text: 'If the movie's being shot on Friday, and today's Tuesday, that means we have...8 days.'
options: South Park: Bigger, Longer, and Un-Cut
questions.explanation:
Jay & Silent Bob Strike Back.

	Jay was trying to figure out how many days they had to stop a movie from being made.

questions.text: 'Sorry I'm just a little wired, AHHH I mean wired as in jumpy, not wired my crotch.'
questions.explanation:
Corky Romano.

	Chris Kattan was trying to walk past security disguised as a detective.

questions.correct: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
options: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
questions.explanation:
Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery.

	Mike Myers was playing Blackjack at a casino, and he tried to introduce himself and ended up pushing himself into a corner.
